word: We will not be speaking of what cannot be done, but of what can be done. \93Go forward,\94 is the word of our Leader. We are distinctly told by the Lord Jesus Christ through His apostle that He \93gave some apostles; and some, prophets; and some, evangelists; and some, pastors and teachers; for the perfecting of the saints, for the work of the ministry, for the edifying of the body of Christ: till we all come in the unity of the faith, and of the knowledge of the Son of God, unto a perfect man, unto the measure of the stature of the fulness of Christ.\94 Here is represented constant growth of knowledge in Christ Jesus, and it is a matter that deserves careful attention.
